channel.title: Miscellania317 | 24/7 VPS NEED PLAYERS & STAFF
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Miscellania317[/size][/center] [hr]
Miscellania is a 317 revision RuneScape Private Server currently aiming at creating a good economy and skill based server with a very good community. Our server is hosted on a 24/7 VPS server.
[ul][li]317 client loading 474 data - maps npcs items`[/li] [li]All 21 skills are working[/li] [li]All dupes and bugs fixed[/li] [li]Easy to use teleport menus[/li] [li]Frequent updates and bugfixes[/li] [li]Full gem cutting and jewelry crafting, fletching works 100%[/li] [li]Woodcutting works all trees[/li] [li]plenty more, join us to find out more![/li][/ul]
[hr] Miscellania is hosted for the players so all suggestions and ideas will be all acknowledged and taken in, so everyone has the chance to see something they'd like in the server.
[url=http://miscellania317.com]Miscellania 317 [/url]

item.title: Miscellania317 | 24/7 VPS NEED PLAYERS & STAFF
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

No pics no clicks. Also, your thread title seems unnecessary. Obviously you need players, otherwise you wouldn’t be advertising. And advertising that you need staff is a short term ploy to get players to be active until you do choose staff, in which most players will leave soon after.

For the sake of your server, I would suggest working on this thread.

Read full topic
